haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Ltn Patrik Schorner, Ltn Patrik Schorner
Ltn Eberhardt Auch, Ltn Eberhardt Auch

 The mission was flown from Pukov aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 08/04/1916 near Factory.
A F.E.2b of 2nd KAO was brought down by Baldemar May of FA 15.
SPk Vladmir Savrasov was killed in action.
Pk Pabiyan Zuyev was killed in action.
Baldemar May was  flying a Roland C.IIa.

On 08/04/1916 near Factory.
A Sikorsky S-16 of 7th AOI was brought down by Bernd Treich of FA 15.
Pk Fedor Fedosov was killed in action.
Bernd Treich was  flying a Roland C.IIa.


Pilots lost were: 
    Ltn Rudiger Hoelscher: Captured
    Ltn Patrik Schorner: Captured
